themes.name: VAPORWAVE ◊ AESTHETIC ◊ ◢ ◣ ◤ ◥
themes.vibe: Retro-futuristic, neon gradients, glitch effects
themes.colors: Purples, pinks, cyans, grid overlays
themes.notes: Based on established 1980s-inspired internet aesthetic but applied to UI design

themes.name: Neumorphism
themes.vibe: Soft UI, tactile, minimal shadows
themes.colors: Light grays, pastels, subtle shadows
themes.tagline: Soft, tactile interfaces that emerge from their background
themes.notes: Emergent UI trend (2019-present) with limited historical roots. UI-specific trend, not a broader design movement

themes.name: Glassmorphism
themes.vibe: Frosted glass, blur effects, translucency
themes.colors: White overlays, soft backgrounds, accent hues
themes.tagline: Frosted glass transparency with sophisticated layering
themes.notes: Post-2020 UI trend with origins in Microsoft's Fluent Design and acrylic material design

themes.name: > CYBERPUNK_ DYSTOPIAN.FUTURE.AESTHETIC [ NEON_REBELLION ]
themes.vibe: High-contrast dystopian, electric urban night, more aggressive than Vaporwave
themes.colors: Deep blacks, neon magenta, electric blue, yellow accents
themes.notes: Authentic representation of 1980s literary/film aesthetic. Correct neon palette and dystopian elements, distinct from Vaporwave's nostalgic tone

themes.name: BRUTALISM RAW. BOLD. UNCOMPROMISING.
themes.vibe: Oversized typography, stark color blocks, deliberate rawness
themes.colors: Black & white, primary pops, minimal gradients
themes.notes: Valid adaptation of architectural brutalism to web. Reference 2015-2017 web brutalism pioneers. Oversized typography and raw style are characteristic

themes.name: Minimal Luxe
themes.vibe: Elegant, whitespace-driven, understated luxury - distinct from regular minimalism
themes.colors: Bone, gold, black, slate, navy
themes.notes: Combines minimalism with luxury aesthetics. Not a recognized movement but coherent theme combining luxury branding with minimalist principles

themes.name: New Wave Typography
themes.vibe: Anti-grid chaos, mixed typefaces, experimental layout breaking
themes.colors: Vibrant clashing colors, geometric overlays, punk aesthetic
themes.tagline: Breaking the grid through typographic rebellion
themes.notes: Authentic Swiss Punk movement that rebelled against International Style grid systems

themes.name: Dark UI
themes.vibe: Sleek, modern, easy on the eyes - UI pattern not design movement
themes.colors: Deep grays, charcoals, accent brights
themes.tagline: Professional dark interfaces for modern experiences
themes.notes: Functional UI pattern rather than design movement. Description accurately covers implementation but should be categorized as interface technique

themes.name: Pastel Futurism
themes.vibe: Soft, optimistic, future-inspired
themes.colors: Pastel gradients, light pink, mint, baby blue
themes.notes: Original combination of pastel colors with futuristic elements. No historical movement equivalent

themes.name: Swiss Style
themes.vibe: Grid-based, typographic discipline, clarity
themes.colors: Red, white, black, gray, clean lines
themes.notes: Established design movement emphasizing mathematical grids, Helvetica, and minimalism

themes.name: Techno-Futuristic
themes.vibe: Bold gradients, animated lines, interactive 3D elements - distinct from Cyberpunk
themes.colors: Vibrant, futuristic tones with holographic effects
themes.notes: Original theme combining technological elements with futurism. No direct historical counterpart, more optimistic than Cyberpunk's dystopian vision

themes.name: Organic UI
themes.vibe: Soft curves, warm neutrals, pastel gradients
themes.colors: Warm neutrals, pastels, earth tones

themes.name: BAUHAUS
themes.vibe: Geometric shapes, primary colors, modular layouts
themes.colors: Primary colors with bold geometric applications
themes.tagline: Form follows function, color follows emotion
themes.notes: Accurate revival of 1920s movement. Correct geometric forms and primary colors. Founded by Walter Gropius, key figures include László Moholy-Nagy and Herbert Bayer

themes.name: Art Deco Digital
themes.vibe: Gold lines, symmetrical patterns, luxurious digital textures with zigzag motifs
themes.colors: Gold metallics, sophisticated symmetrical palettes with sunburst patterns
themes.tagline: Golden age glamour meets digital sophistication
themes.notes: Valid digital adaptation of 1920s movement. Gold accents and symmetry are characteristic. References zigzag patterns and sunburst motifs typical of the era

themes.name: Cinematic UI
themes.vibe: Movie title sequence inspiration, dramatic typography
themes.colors: High contrast, cinematic drama

themes.name: Nordic Cool
themes.vibe: Soft, muted palettes, clean sans-serifs, honest minimalism
themes.colors: Muted hygge-inspired tones

themes.name: Gradient Futurism
themes.vibe: Multi-color gradients, iridescent overlays, soft glows
themes.colors: Multi-gradient, iridescent, Apple-inspired
themes.notes: Original concept combining gradient aesthetics with futuristic design principles

themes.name: Corporate Memphis
themes.vibe: Playful 2D shapes, friendly illustrations, approachable
themes.colors: Pastels, playful brights

themes.name: Environmental
themes.vibe: Earthy tones, hand-drawn elements, natural textures
themes.colors: Earth tones, natural pigments

themes.name: Hyper-Functional
themes.vibe: Extreme utility, no distractions, maximized usability
themes.colors: Minimal, functional palette

themes.name: Claymorphism
themes.vibe: Subtle 3D icons, tactile buttons, playful shadows
themes.colors: Soft clay-like textures and shadows
themes.notes: Emerging 3D style with tactile quality. Soft shadows accurately represent the trend. UI-specific and still evolving

themes.name: Liquid UI
themes.vibe: Fluid animations, morphing shapes, water-inspired transitions
themes.colors: Flowing, gradient-based
themes.notes: Cutting-edge concept with morphing shapes. Description matches experimental implementations, references material design's fluid transitions

themes.name: Analog Revival
themes.vibe: Tape textures, typewriter fonts, grain for authenticity
themes.colors: Vintage, worn textures

themes.name: Transparent UI
themes.vibe: Layered panels, see-through navs, soft overlays
themes.colors: Translucent overlays with depth

themes.name: 禅 Zen Digital
themes.vibe: Wabi-sabi, intentional imperfections, mindful whitespace
themes.colors: Natural, contemplative earth tones

themes.name: ◊ Psychedelic UX ◊
themes.vibe: Pulsating gradients, liquid morphs, color-shifting shadows
themes.colors: Dynamic, shifting, hallucinogenic palettes

themes.name: Quantum UI
themes.vibe: Elements with dynamic context, multiple simultaneous states
themes.colors: Shifting, unpredictable yet controlled
themes.tagline: Interfaces that exist in multiple states
themes.notes: Futuristic concept without real-world precedent. Multiple states concept is original and speculative in nature

themes.name: AI-Native Design
themes.vibe: ML/generative elements, adaptive layouts, conversational UI patterns
themes.colors: Neural network blues, algorithmic gradients, data-driven palettes

themes.name: Y3K Futurism
themes.vibe: Post-digital minimalism, holographic textures, beyond-screen thinking
themes.colors: Holographic shifts, prismatic effects, light-based palettes
themes.tagline: Beyond the screen, beyond the digital

themes.name: MONOCHROME
themes.vibe: Single-color focus, disciplined, dramatic
themes.colors: Shades of one color, high contrast
themes.notes: Historically significant technique. Single-color focus is accurately represented with historical print design precedents

themes.name: Luxury Black
themes.vibe: Premium, exclusive, dark palette, gold/silver accents
themes.colors: Matte black, metallics, deep jewel tones

themes.name: Tech Minimal
themes.vibe: Utilitarian, ultra-clean, focus on function
themes.colors: White, gray, blue, occasional accent

themes.name: RETRO_TECH.EXE
themes.vibe: 80s/90s inspired, nostalgic interfaces
themes.colors: Beige, teal, salmon, pixel art, skeuomorphism

themes.name: POST-MODERN
themes.vibe: Controlled explosion of pattern and color
themes.colors: Varied, maximal palette

themes.name: HIGH CONTRAST PURE. STARK. CONFIDENT.
themes.vibe: Pure contrast, crisp lines, high-impact typography
themes.colors: Strict black & white only

themes.name: RETRO//FUTURE
themes.vibe: 80s/90s optimism: neon, chrome, pixel fonts
themes.colors: Neon, chrome, grid backgrounds

themes.name: Editorial Luxe
themes.vibe: Oversized serif headlines, generous margins, full-bleed images
themes.colors: Editorial, muted luxury tones

themes.name: Dark Academia
themes.vibe: Rich burgundies, forest greens, serif typography
themes.colors: Rich burgundies, forest greens, deep blues

themes.name: INDUSTRIAL
themes.vibe: Exposed digital elements, monospace fonts, raw materials
themes.colors: Industrial grays, muted metallics

themes.name: Solarpunk Aesthetic
themes.vibe: Optimistic eco-futurism, green tech, sustainable materials
themes.colors: Bright nature-inspired palettes, solar yellows, plant greens

themes.name: Dopamine Design
themes.vibe: Intentionally joyful, endorphin-triggering color explosions
themes.colors: Bright, saturated, happiness-inducing color combinations
themes.tagline: Pure joy through color and interaction

themes.name: Medical/Healthcare UI
themes.vibe: Clean, accessible, trust-building design patterns
themes.colors: Medical blues, calming greens, trustworthy whites

themes.name: Financial/Fintech
themes.vibe: Security-focused, data-dense, professional aesthetics
themes.colors: Trust-building blues, secure greens, professional grays

themes.name: Gaming UI/HUD
themes.vibe: Immersive overlays, fantasy/sci-fi elements, competitive design
themes.colors: Electric blues, energy oranges, warning reds, HUD greens

themes.name: Crypto/Web3 Native
themes.vibe: Blockchain-inspired, decentralized aesthetics, token economics
themes.colors: Crypto golds, blockchain blues, decentralized purples
themes.tagline: Decentralized design for the new web

themes.name: Scientific/Technical
themes.vibe: Blueprint aesthetics, diagrams, technical drawing precision
themes.colors: Blueprint blues, technical grays, precision whites
themes.tagline: Precision and clarity through technical design

themes.name: Luxury Automotive
themes.vibe: Chrome finishes, leather textures, precision engineering elegance
themes.colors: Chrome silvers, leather browns, precision blacks

themes.name: Afrofuturism
themes.vibe: Cultural futurism with African diaspora aesthetics
themes.colors: Rich golds, deep purples, earth tones, vibrant patterns
themes.tagline: Future through the lens of African heritage

themes.name: Cottagecore Digital
themes.vibe: Cozy, handmade, rural aesthetic translated to digital
themes.colors: Soft creams, sage greens, warm browns, floral accents
themes.tagline: Digital warmth inspired by cottage living

themes.name: Kawaii/Cute Culture
themes.vibe: Japanese cute culture, soft rounded forms, playful interactions
themes.colors: Pastel pinks, baby blues, mint greens, sunshine yellows

themes.name: Steampunk UI
themes.vibe: Victorian machinery, brass, copper, gears, industrial elegance
themes.colors: Brass golds, copper browns, steam grays, mechanical silvers

themes.name: Gothic Revival
themes.vibe: Dark, ornate, cathedral-inspired, dramatic typography
themes.colors: Deep purples, midnight blacks, cathedral grays, stained glass accents

themes.name: Art Nouveau Digital
themes.vibe: Flowing organic forms, nature motifs, elegant curves
themes.colors: Natural greens, flowing blues, organic golds, floral accents

themes.name: Constructivist Revival
themes.vibe: Soviet-era geometric propaganda aesthetics
themes.colors: Revolutionary reds, industrial blacks, constructivist whites
themes.tagline: Revolutionary design for the digital age

themes.name: Grunge Digital
themes.vibe: Distressed textures, rough edges, rebellious 90s aesthetic
themes.colors: Distressed browns, rebellious blacks, faded denim blues

themes.name: Synthwave/Outrun
themes.vibe: 80s neon, palm trees, sunset gradients, retro-futuristic
themes.colors: Neon pinks, electric blues, sunset oranges, cyber purples

themes.name: Y2K Millennium
themes.vibe: Early 2000s internet aesthetic, metallic textures, chrome effects
themes.colors: Chrome silvers, millennium blues, cyber greens, metallic purples

themes.name: Vintage Terminal
themes.vibe: Green phosphor, amber monochrome, computing nostalgia
themes.colors: Terminal greens, amber displays, phosphor whites, CRT blacks

themes.name: Mid-Century Modern
themes.vibe: 1950s atomic age, clean lines, geometric patterns
themes.colors: Atomic oranges, space age blues, modern grays, geometric yellows
themes.tagline: Atomic age optimism meets modern design

themes.name: Space Age Modernism
themes.vibe: 1960s NASA aesthetic, atomic symbols, futuristic optimism
themes.colors: NASA blues, rocket silvers, atomic greens, space whites
themes.tagline: Space race optimism in digital form

themes.name: Liminal Space
themes.vibe: Eerie, transitional, uncanny valley aesthetics, threshold spaces
themes.colors: Transition grays, threshold yellows, liminal blues, uncanny whites
themes.tagline: Design at the edge of familiarity

themes.name: Holographic Interfaces
themes.vibe: Iridescent, shifting, prismatic effects, rainbow reflections
themes.colors: Holographic shifts, prismatic rainbows, iridescent gradients
themes.tagline: Light as interface, color as interaction

themes.name: Glitch Art
themes.vibe: Digital corruption, error aesthetics, intentional broken elements
themes.colors: Error reds, corruption pinks, digital greens, system blues

themes.name: Kinetic Typography
themes.vibe: Moving text as primary design element, animated letterforms
themes.colors: Motion blues, kinetic oranges, animated purples, flowing greens
themes.tagline: Text in motion, meaning in movement

themes.name: Data Visualization Native
themes.vibe: Charts and graphs as aesthetic elements, infographic beauty
themes.colors: Data blues, chart greens, graph oranges, metric purples
themes.tagline: Information as aesthetic, data as design

themes.name: Experimental Typography
themes.vibe: Type as art, unconventional text treatments, letter chaos
themes.colors: Typographic blacks, experimental reds, chaotic yellows, artistic blues
themes.tagline: Letters as art, words as design

themes.name: Tropical Modernism
themes.vibe: Bright, vibrant, vacation-inspired, palm and coral palettes
themes.colors: Tropical blues, coral pinks, palm greens, sunset oranges

themes.name: Pastel Goth
themes.vibe: Dark themes with soft colors, contradictory aesthetic harmony
themes.colors: Pastel purples, soft blacks, gentle pinks, muted grays
